name: One Incident In A Small Town
name_original: One Incident In A Small Town
description:
Ron returned to his city and found him mired in the mud of crime, murders, abductions, drugs and the complete outrage of crime. Thanks to his military past, Ron is not bad at managing firearms and is burning with the desire to cleanse the city of this criminal epidemic and free the hostages.

One Incident In A Small Town - A single-action shooter where the player controls the scope and shoots enemies, avoiding being taken hostage. All your actions are taken into account in the bonus counter, shoot down flying boxes on balloons and get more health, killing civilians you lose your bonuses and add killing bandits and knocking down gyrocopters that photograph you.



Game Features:
- Various difficulty
- Reaction Workout
- Difficult Boss
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
